projectLocations.description: Relative or absolute path(s) to projects, scans entire folder for make.json and template.json configurations.

workspaceFile.description: Path to workspace file, exclusive to Visual Studio Code, all opened and created projects are added into this file.

defaultTemplate.description: Default template selected upon creating a new project, may be relative or absolute path to the template directory.

currentProject.description: Path of currently selected project, also editable via associated task or console command.

ndkPath.description: May be provided if you have already installed NDK for native code compilation, recommended version is r16b. By default, toolchain searches for the compiler in PATH or installs itself.

devices.description: List of saved devices, editable during ADB configuration setup; contains private information, thus editing here isn't allowed.

componentInstallationWithoutCommit.description: Are '.commit' markers required for installed components? Disabling prevents update installations but considers a component installed if there's a folder present.

updateAcceptReplaceConfiguration.description: Should configuration files in the main toolchain directory (e.g., .vscode/tasks.json). Otherwise, your modifications won't change even after updates.

denyJavaScript.description: Forces TypeScript compiler even if the project contains exclusively JavaScript files.

debugIncludesExclude.description: Declarations excluded by TypeScript compiler during development compilation, helps shorten compile time. If the given path isn't found, there will be another attempt with the absolute variant.

abis.description: List of ABIs supported by your project.

debugAbi.description: Primary architecture for native code compilation during development.

pushTo.description: Main output folder of modpack on device, chosen at any connection point; toolchain path to the mod, in Make it points directly to the mod itself.

pushAnyLocation.description: By default, if property 'pushTo' does not indicate an installation of Inner Core package, a warning will be shown when sending to unusual locations; this option turns off that behavior.

pushUnchangedFiles.description: Whether or not to send all files to the device rather than only those which are modified.

doNothingIfDisconnected.description: Rather than prompting for device setup via console, simply exits build process if no devices are connected.

adb.description: Additional settings for ADB debugging bridge.

skipDescription.description: Skips the description page while creating a project using the template, i.e., only enter the name, other properties will be taken from the template or replaced by specified ones.

template.description: Values automatically filled when creating new project, overwrites properties if they're already defined within the template.
